title: User Authentication and Security Setup
summary: Implement secure user authentication with multi-factor verification to protect sensitive banking data.
description: Develop a robust authentication system allowing users to log in securely using credentials and multi-factor authentication methods such as OTPs or authenticator apps. This EPIC includes secure password management, account recovery features, and session timeout mechanisms to ensure user data protection. The implementation should comply with banking security standards and regulations, ensuring end-to-end encryption and secure handling of personally identifiable information (PII).

title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
summary: Create role-based access management to ensure users can access resources based on their roles and permissions.
description: Design and implement role-based access control (RBAC) mechanisms to restrict access to banking services and data based on user roles, such as customer, relationship manager, or admin. Ensure that customers only see products and services applicable to their profiles and authorization levels. Include functionality for profile management, authorization auditing, and dynamic access level adjustments when users' roles or product eligibility change.

title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
summary: Build a modern, responsive, and user-friendly interface for seamless access across devices.
description: Develop a responsive web interface that adapts seamlessly to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The dashboard should display available products, recent transactions, and shortcuts for common actions. Focus on accessibility, intuitive navigation, and minimal clicks to enhance user experience. Implement a design system consistent with the bank’s branding, ensuring modern aesthetics and easy usability.

title: Personalized Banking Product Recommendations
summary: Implement dynamic, personalized product and service recommendations based on user profiles and eligibility.
description: Develop an engine that analyzes user accounts, demographics, behavior, and previous interactions to tailor product recommendations. Display eligible banking products and services within the dashboard. Ensure secure handling of the data used for personalization and compliance with regulatory privacy standards. This feature should aid in enhancing customer engagement and promoting cross-selling opportunities.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open accounts and request modifications through simplified digital workflows.
description: Create workflow-driven modules to allow customers to submit account opening, modification, and service requests online. Include the ability to save partial progress and resume later. Allow secure document uploads for KYC and verification purposes. Optimize the flow for minimal clicks, automate validations where possible, and integrate approval processes with internal systems. Ensure a frictionless self-service experience.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Implement real-time request tracking and automated notification mechanisms for customer submissions.
description: Enable users to track real-time status updates of their account opening or service modification requests within the portal. Integrate email and possibly SMS notifications for key updates, such as submission confirmation, approval, or required additional information. Ensure that the communication templates are configurable and comply with regulatory communication standards.

title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a comprehensive log of user activities and requests for transparency and compliance.
description: Implement a complete interaction history module for users to view their past applications, submitted documents, service modifications, and system notifications. Additionally, ensure the system maintains a detailed audit trail for compliance and troubleshooting, capturing metadata such as timestamps, changes made, and user identifiers. This will improve customer trust and support regulatory reporting needs.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core systems for data synchronization and service request automation.
description: Develop robust integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system to enable seamless data exchange for account details, transactions, and request processing. Use secure APIs and middleware for real-time communication and data consistency. Include error handling, retry logic, and monitoring mechanisms to ensure reliability. The integration should preserve system performance and comply with data-sharing policies.

title: Performance Optimization and Database Management
summary: Establish a dedicated portal database optimized for performance and reliability.
description: Design and implement a dedicated database architecture for the self-service portal to handle user sessions, workflows, and interaction data independently from the core banking systems. Ensure proper indexing, caching, and load-balancing strategies to optimize query performance. Include backup and disaster recovery plans, along with monitoring tools to maintain uptime and scalability as usage grows.
